an5.131:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato raja cakkavatti dhammeneva cakkam vatteti;
an5.131:1.2: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam kenaci manussabhutena paccatthikena panina.
an5.131:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, raja cakkavatti atthannu ca hoti, dhammannu ca, mattannu ca, kalannu ca, parisannu ca.
an5.131:2.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato raja cakkavatti dhammeneva cakkam pavatteti;
an5.131:2.4: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam kenaci manussabhutena paccatthikena panina.
an5.131:3.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato tathagato araham sammasambuddho dhammeneva anuttaram dhammacakkam pavatteti;
an5.131:3.2: tam hoti cakkam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
an5.131:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, tathagato araham sammasambuddho atthannu, dhammannu, mattannu, kalannu, parisannu.
an5.131:4.3: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato tathagato araham sammasambuddho dhammeneva anuttaram dhammacakkam pavatteti;
an5.131:4.4: tam hoti dhammacakkam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmin”ti.
